meanings.definition: A member of a farmers' association.
meanings.sent1: The grangers gathered to discuss crop prices.
meanings.sent2: She became a granger to support local farmers.
meanings.sent3: The grangers held a potluck to celebrate their harvest.
meanings.sent4: He was the backbone of the grangers, always ready to help.
meanings.sent5: The grangers' unity was as strong as the roots of their crops.

meanings.definition: A person who operates a grain elevator.
meanings.sent1: The grangers loaded the grain into the elevator.
meanings.sent2: As a granger, he ensured the smooth operation of the elevator.
meanings.sent3: The grangers raced to see who could fill the elevator fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled granger, moving grain with precision.
meanings.sent5: The grangers' teamwork kept the elevator running efficiently.

meanings.definition: A person who is involved in agriculture.
meanings.sent1: The grangers tended to the fields with care.
meanings.sent2: As a granger, he understood the importance of sustainable farming.
meanings.sent3: The grangers joked about having dirt under their nails.
meanings.sent4: She was a true granger, connected to the land and its rhythms.
meanings.sent5: The grangers' dedication to agriculture was unwavering.
